Anna Fox

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Annie
  2. Foster Name: Anna
  3. Foster Family: Henry and Minnie Mueting
  4. Location of Family: Bloomfield, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place:
  7. Age on Arrival: 2
  8. Date of Birth: 1897-11-01, Manhattan, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1933-XX-XX
  10. Gender: female
  11. Source: Eloise Thomsen Corres., Nebraska State Historical Society; NOTC; 1910 United States Federal Census; Crossroads, April 1992, p. 3; ROT A-L Neb, 4.
